content.rendered:
I went to the gym last night but didn’t stay long. I had gone the night before but don’t plan to go tonight. I know that rest is an important part of fitness. I just don’t fully understand how exercise, rest and diet work together.

The gym that I go to has an app that helps with diet. I just haven’t explored it yet. Also, they offer something for $10 dollars that helps me to know some things about myself, like bone density and body fat. I’m not sure all that it does, but I’m interested in knowing more.

I do know a little about diet. And I have learned a little about overall fitness. What works for someone else, however, may not work for me. And the thing that works for me may not work for you. That’s why it’s important to get the advise of a professional.

It’s also good to have a goal. Not only can a goal give us clear direction, but it can help us to continue when motivation seems low.

Questions, comments? Please share them below.
